data.name: Digital LimitedPack [OST + Art Book]
data.detailed_description:
HOW TO ACCESS BONUS CONTENT
The digital bonuses are kept in a folder called Digital Limited Pack, within the folder that you installed the game to.

You can access the content with the following steps:
1. Right-click the game in your Steam Library, then select Properties.
2. On the Local Files tab, select Browse.

BONUS CONTENT
・Visual Art Books
A collection of special Lotus Labyrinth illustrations and legacy Genso Wanderer illustrations.

・Cut-in Illustrations
A collection of illustrations for cut-ins used in-game.

・Complete Soundtrack
A game soundtrack including all 141 of the game's tracks.

・Special Radio Drama
Contains the following three voice dramas:
Forgetful Fireworks
A Taboo (?) Tablet
All Together Now, Fairies

data.short_description: This includes Touhou Genso Wanderer -Lotus Labyrinth R- artbooks and soundtrack.
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64bit, Windows® 8.1 64bit, Windows® 7 SP1 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64bit, Windows® 8.1 64bit, Windows® 7 SP1 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
